data.name: ReadCashReceiptDetail
data.value: select top(1) CRV_IDENTIFIER, CST_IDENTIFIER, CRT_IDENTIFIER, CRD_ID from CKT_CR_DETAIL where (CRD_ID = @crdId) and (CRV_IDENTIFIER = @crvIdentifier) and (CST_IDENTIFIER = @cstIdentifier) and (CRT_IDENTIFIER = @crtIdentifier)

data.name: ReadCashReceiptDetailAddress
data.value: select top(1) CRDETAIL_ADDRESS_I, STREET_1, STREET_2, CITY, [STATE], ZIP_CODE_5, ZIP_CODE_4, ZIP_CODE_3, CRT_IDENTIFIER, CST_IDENTIFIER, CRV_IDENTIFIER, CRD_IDENTIFIER from CKT_CRDETAIL_ADDRS where CRDETAIL_ADDRESS_I = @crdetailAddressI

data.name: ReadReceiptRefund
data.value: select CREATED_TIMESTAMP, CDA_IDENTIFIER from CKT_RECEIPT_REFUND where @cdaIdentifier = CDA_IDENTIFIER

data.name: UpdateCashReceiptDetailAddress
data.value: update CKT_CRDETAIL_ADDRS set STREET_1 = @street1, STREET_2 = @street2, CITY = @city, [STATE] = @state, ZIP_CODE_5 = @zipCode5, ZIP_CODE_4 = @zipCode4, ZIP_CODE_3 = @zipCode3 where CRDETAIL_ADDRESS_I = @crdetailAddressI
